name: IDBDatabase.onversionchange
description: This example shows an IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded block that creates a new object store; it also includes onerror and onabort functions to handle non-success cases, and an onversionchange function to notify when a database structure change has occurred.

refs.name: Indexed Database API 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'onversionchange' in Indexed Database API 2.0.
